short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds click events to the categories and filters the decklist.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
More fine-granular control over your deck-viewing on decksofkeyforge.com.

Click the stat and this extension will highlight the cards that are the basis for that stat, to easier see the distribution.

Works with tide raisers and token makers as well.
